articles.title: Depp, Heard roasted on American TV - news.com.au
articles.description: American TV show Saturday Night Live opened up by lampooning the explosive allegations made in the ongoing Johnny Depp and Amber Heard defamation trial, focusing primarily on the claims that Heard defecated on her and Depp’s bed.
articles.content: The iconic Saturday Night Live took aim at Johnny Depp and Amber Heard on the weekend as the pairs defamation trial is set to resume.American TV show Saturday Night Live opened up by lampooning the e… [+2357 chars]

articles.title: Religious Beliefs, Terrain Hampering Measles Immunization Program in Zimbabwe - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: The government says it hopes to conduct immunizations for measles throughout Zimbabwe in the coming weeks to contain the disease
